snippet: Representative Paul D. Ryan traveled to Las Vegas to meet with Sheldon Adelson in what Mitt Romney’s camp called a “finance event.”
abstract: Republican vice-presidential candidate Paul Ryan travels to the Venetian hotel in Las Vegas to meet with billionaire casino mogul Sheldon Adelson, who has pledged to spend as much as $100 million in 2012 to defeat Pres Obama.

byline.original: By TRIP GABRIEL and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE
byline.contributor: Trip Gabriel reported from Las Vegas, and Nicholas Confessore from New York.

lead_paragraph: Representative Paul D. Ryan traveled to Las Vegas to meet with Sheldon Adelson in what Mitt Romney’s camp called a “finance event.”

headline.seo: Ryan Travels to Las Vegas to Meet G.O.P. Donor Adelson
headline.main: Ryan Meets Casino Mogul and Major G.O.P. Donor
headline.print_headline: Ryan Meets Casino Mogul and Major G.O.P. Donor
